category: Member City/Provincial Sports Association Regulations/Article 6 (Rights and Obligations of City/Provincial Sports Associations)
contents: Article 6 (Rights and obligations of city/provincial sports councils) ① City/provincial sports councils have rights and obligations pursuant to Article 10 of the Sports Council Articles of Incorporation. Revised February 4, 2021 ② City/provincial sports associations must pay membership fees pursuant to Article 10, Paragraph 2, Item 3 of the Sports Council Articles of Incorporation at the time determined by the Board of Directors of the Sports Council. Revised on October 6, 2021. ③ The sports association shall report the membership fees paid by the city/provincial sports association pursuant to paragraph 2 to the general meeting of the sports association. Revised on October 6, 2021. ④ City/provincial sports associations must comply with the anti-doping regulations of the Korea Anti-Doping Commission as stipulated in Article 2 (4) of the Sports Council’s Articles of Incorporation. Revised 2021. 2. 4. [Fully revised 2017. 3. 23.] [Title revised 2021. 10. 6.]
